page.title: 06Cromford School - Today
page.content: {Our School}now has 112 children. We have five classes taught by the headteacher and four teachers.Children come in the term they're five and leave at the end of the year in which they're eleven.Maths, reading, spelling, writing, poetry, topics (like canals, mining, countries, rivers, birds)PE,art, sewing,a little science, using the computer are some of the subjects we do.Generally children like school. In the 4th year Juniors we have many trips _planting trees, visiting museums, nature studies, sports activty days and fun days like a day at Blackpool. Usually the school runs an away trip_this year we went to{LONDON.}We give Harvest gifts in the autumn. We have{DISCOS,}parties and plays at chistmas, sports and activity days in the summer.
